subtasks: Determine appropriate pesticide for the pest
Select proper pesticide formulation (liquid or dry)
Wear protective clothing (fully covered, neoprene gloves, long sleeves, pants, coveralls)
Use protective equipment (goggles or face shield)
Keep unauthorized people and children away
Follow safety measures (work against the wind, avoid inhalation, use low pressure spray)
Wear protective gloves and remove them after use
Wash protective clothing daily and check gloves for leaks
Dispose of pesticide containers properly (three washes, destroy or bury)
Keep in a secure, cool, dry place away from water
Dispose of spills immediately and safely
Dispose of containers in a special landfill
Recognize symptoms of mild, moderate, and severe poisoning
Call paramedics immediately in case of pesticide poisoning
Follow first aid instructions on the pesticide label
